description: Creates a new library item for an Amazon Q App, allowing it to be discovered and used by other allowed users.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q App to publish to the library.

parameters.name: appVersion
parameters.description: The version of the Amazon Q App to publish to the library.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: The categories to associate with the library item for easier discovery. (string) ---

nested_items.name: libraryItemId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the new library item.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the new library item, such as 'Published'.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the library item was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the library item.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the library item was last updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last updated the library item.

nested_items.name: ratingCount
nested_items.description: The number of ratings the library item has received from users.

nested_items.name: isVerified
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the library item has been verified.
